Package dev.orphoros.demo.amalgamlib.services

Class ReviewService

  • java.lang.Object
    • dev.orphoros.demo.amalgamlib.services.ReviewService
  • @Service
public class ReviewService
extends java.lang.Object
    Review Service

    This class is responsible validating parameters, checking for exceptions and connecting the ReviewController with the ReviewRepository.

    This class may throw HTTP status codes in the 400 range if an exception happened.

    HTTP status codes in the 500 range may be thrown as well if an uncaught exception happens.

    Version:
    1.2
    Author:
    Orphoros
    See Also:
    ReviewController, ReviewService, ReviewRepository

    • Method Detail

      • getFilteredReviews

        public java.util.List<Review> getFilteredReviews​(java.lang.Long ISBN,
                                                 java.lang.Integer stars,
                                                 java.lang.String nickname)
        Gives a list of filtered reviews based on filter parameters

        Some parameters are optional for filtering

        Parameters:
        ISBN - The book to which the review has been written (must not be null)
        stars - Book's rating with stars
        nickname - Name of the reviewer (case sensitive)
        Returns:
        List of found reviews
        Throws:
        BadRequestException - if parameter validation fails

      • getReviewByID

        public Review getReviewByID​(java.lang.Long id)
        Finds a review by its corresponding ID
        Parameters:
        id - ID of the review to find
        Returns:
        Review that belongs to the ID
        Throws:
        NotFoundException - if the ID does not exist in the database
        BadRequestException - if the ID is empty is incorrect

      • addNewReview

        public Review addNewReview​(Review r)
        Save a new review to the database
        Parameters:
        r - Review object to save
        Returns:
        Review object that has been successfully saved
        Throws:
        BadRequestException - if the review object is not properly formatted
        NotFoundException - if the review's parent Book ISBN could not be found

      • deleteReview

        public void deleteReview​(java.lang.Long id)
        Delete an existing review from the database
        Parameters:
        id - ID of the existing review to be deleted
        Throws:
        BadRequestException - if the ID is not properly formatted
        NotFoundException - if the ID does not exist in the database

      • updateReview

        public Review updateReview​(java.lang.Long id,
                           Review r)
        Update the values of an existing review in the database
        Parameters:
        id - ID of the existing review object
        r - Review object with the updated values (ID must be present as well)
        Returns:
        Review object with the new values that has been successfully updated
        Throws:
        BadRequestException - if the author object is not properly formatted or the IDs are incorrect
        NotFoundException - if the IDs do not exist in the database

        Parameters:

        private java.util.List<Review> getReviewsByStarsAndNickname​(java.lang.Long ISBN,
                                                            java.lang.Integer stars,
                                                            java.lang.String nickname)
        Gives results based on filter parameters.
        Parameters:
        ISBN - Book ID
        stars - Rated stars
        nickname - Nickname of the author of review
        Returns:
        List of found reviews. An empty list is returned if nothing is found.
